content: **crocheted jumper in drops cotton light the piece is worked top down with round yoke fan pattern and bobbles sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no cluster-124 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops cotton light from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 550-600-700-750-800-900 g colour 21 light beige crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm **crochet gauge** 16 treble crochets in width and 8 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
